title: Len Saldua
author: Len Saldua
content: Anyone looking to get into Silver this bear market ? Tokenized Silver may be the answer. Just discovered it yesterday so I'm still doing my own research, but it looks promising. Aurus Silver ( AWS )Aurus Gold ( AWG ) is also available, but it's up 27% since yesterday... so something doesn't add up here, or maybe I'm not reading it correctly. Does this token track the price of real Gold ? or is it something else altogether ?They also have Aurus DeFi, where your AWS and AWG can be staked I think. Of course DeFi is going through a bear market as well so not much happening there ATM...
